Jackson D Bateman

BRINGING TALENT AND TENACITY TOGETHER

More than just a triple threat, he's the complete package: actor, singer, musician, and creative force. With a voice that can shake the rafters or whisper sweet serenades, Jackson's perfect pitch and masterful tenor have graced prestigious venues from iHeartRadio to Broadway in Bryant Park. When he's not composing original music or dazzling audiences with his piano skills, you might catch him teaching gravity a lesson with his juggling acts or bringing characters to life through his arsenal of voice impressions. This isn't just talent – this is artistry in motion. Ready to elevate your upcoming production? Jackson Bateman is your next leading man.
  • Jackson Bateman

  • Jackson Bateman

Born for the spotlight and trained for excellence, Jackson Bateman is Broadway's rising star with perfect pitch and limitless range. This AMDA-trained tenor doesn't just perform roles – he transforms them. From commanding the stage as Danny Zuko to captivating audiences as Raoul in Phantom, Jackson brings an electrifying presence that leaves audiences spellbound.
